en.title: FusionExcel Launch National Golf Long Drive Challenge!
en.content:
FusionExcel is proud to announce the launch of it's Golf Long Drive Challenge at a press conference held at FusionExcel 's HQ on 24th September 2008 with FusionExcel Spokesman and International Long Drive Golf Specialist, Jean Daniels. At the press conference, attended by TV3, the press and FusionExcel's Leaders, a mock up cheque of RM 500,000 was presented by FusionExcel's CEO Paul Ting to Jean Daniels as the Main Sponsor of the nationwide event.

FE's Golf Long Drive Challenge, to be held at prominent golf courses at Penang, Johore Bahru and KL, is a GREAT OPPORTUNITY for all FE Members to bring their downlines and prospects to participate. It is also a GREAT OPPORTUNITY for FE Members to do prospecting as there will be huge walk in crowds attracted by the substantial cash prizes (RM 50,000) and product prizes (RM100,000) and a carnival like atmosphere with more than 30 participating leading golf equipment, and apparrels merchants doing clearance sales promotions.

Media coverage for the event will be huge (10 full page adverts in Malay Mail with across page banner on the front page, 1 full page advert in The Star - Star Golf Section, 1 full page advert in NST - Tee Times Section. There will also be full page writeups in each of these national newspapers to coincide with the adverts). Posters promoting the event will be posted at all leading golf courses around the country.

There is no MLM company like FusionExcel in the world (we do things DIFFERENTLY!) and this yet another hard to follow act of having our VERY OWN major sports event will take FE to another level and will be talked about for a long time to come, just like our PGA Merchandise Show in Orlando, January 2008 and our Thailand Grand Opening Event recently, with helicopter, skydivers, horse cavalry, superstars AND would you believe it, TWIN RAINBOWS appearing over the stage at the closing ! What a blessing!

FusionExcel would like to take this opportunity to wish all our Leaders and Members GREAT SUCCESS ahead and to SEE YOU ALL AT THE TOP!

meta.description: FusionExcel is proud to announce the launch of it's Golf Long Drive Challenge at a press conference held at FusionExcel's HQ.
meta.keyword: FusionExcel Launch National Golf Long Drive Challenge, International Long Drive Golf Specialist, Jean Daniels, golf courses, Penang, Johore Bahru, KL.
meta.author: klhunter
